name: FOR .. FILTER .. RETURN template
value:
FOR i IN @collection
  FILTER i.`attribute` == @value
  RETURN i

name: Limit
value:
FOR i IN @collection
  LIMIT @offset, @count
  RETURN i

name: Random document
value:
FOR i IN @collection
  SORT RAND()
  LIMIT 1
  RETURN i

name: Subquery example
value:
FOR i IN @collection
  LET values = (
    FOR s IN i.`attribute`
    FILTER s.`attribute` == @value
    RETURN s
  )
  FILTER LENGTH(values) > @count
  RETURN {
    i : i,
    values : values
  }
